__e: Oh, it's just the same junk Dad brings us home from work.
- I mean, you should see some of the crap that I have to read.
You took a woman who was so innocent, she was like a child, never hurt a single person, and then you killed her for a... a trinket that you wanted.
The blood downstairs was some bottom-shelf shit.
I stopped drinking this cheap shit in college.
She thought she was better than everyone else, and now she's the stuff you throw out with the trash, and that's what happens to people who mess with me, man.
Whose junk is this, and what in the hell is it doing in my precinct?
Pack up your shit. Get the fuck out of my rental.
Junk is the stuff that was once valuable to us, but that we now have no use for.
